column4: hello, i have a big problem...i start Ubuntu...I have wait for 2 min but the board dont proceed...after 3 minute I see black window...the error message is:   BusyBox v1.1.3 Debian 1:1.1.3-2ubuntu3) Built-in shell (ash); /bin/sh: can't acess tty; job control turned off.......what I should do?
